title: DPM/FM for practical steps to improve Pak Missions’ efficacy
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 15 (APP): Deputy Prime Minister/Foreign Minister Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Saturday directed for taking practical steps for the improvement of efficacy and effectiveness of Pakistan’s Missions in line with the broader strategic objectives of the government.
The DPM/FM chaired the first meeting of the Committee on Rationalizing Pakistan’s Missions abroad which was constituted by the Prime Minister, DPM/FM Office, said in a press release.
The meeting reviewed the structure, functioning and performance of Pakistan’s Missions abroad.
